"ARKS Cards":
"Your ARKS Card is a card which you can use to give other players a little information about yourself.
To view and edit your ARKS Card, open the Main Menu, select \"Personal\", then select \"ARKS Card\"."

"On the Edit screen, you can set a comment, show off your character's appearance, display a Symbol Art or a Stamp and assemble a Title for yourself.

If you set your ARKS Card's visibility to Public, other players will be able to view it.
â€»You can change your ARKS Card's visibility from the Edit screen."
